cells.data:
-- dropWhileEnd :: (Char -> Bool) -> String -> String
-- dropWhileEnd :: (a -> Bool) -> [a] -> [a]
on dropWhileEnd(p, xs)
    set i to length of xs
    tell mReturn(p)
        repeat while i > 0 and |λ|(item i of xs)
            set i to i - 1
        end repeat
    end tell
    if i > 0 then
        if class of xs ≠ string then
            items 1 thru i of xs
        else
            text 1 thru i of xs
        end if
    else
        {}
    end if
end dropWhileEnd
